page.title: 01 THE AREA AS A WHOLE.
page.content: The block is situated 4km from the N.E. coast and 2-3km from the major city of Newcastle.It includes the eastern edge of the Killingworth New Town Complex and the older mining villages of Shiremoor and Backworth. The following pages try to show a little of life within these contrasting areas and includes some details of daily life and some of the more regional pastimes i.e.Leek Growing,Whippet Racing and Pigeon Racing. The problem of unemployment and peoples attitudes are also recorded in 20 pages. The newest mode of transport in the country i.e.THE METRO is also noted in text.
